channel.description: Recent content in Mounts & Sights on Akol

item.title: Mounts & Sights Info
item.description: You are here because you clicked on the Mounts & Sights link in the DayZ main menu. The mounts compatibility infographic might be useful: More information about the mod in the Steam Workshop page. If you enjoy the mod and want to foment further development, consider making a donation.

item.title: Mounts & Sights QR Code
item.description: You are here because you scanned one of the QR codes from the Mounts & Sights mod for DayZ. The mounts compatibility infographic might be useful: If you enjoy the mod and want to foment further development, consider making a donation. If you’ve been redirected here from a server that is not using the mod named “Mounts & Sights”, you are playing in a server that is using a redistributed version of the mod.
